mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id userId, A.nm stdnm, A.email, A.pic, A.birth, A.phone, A.address , B.class_id classId, B.grade, B.class van, C.school_id schoolId, C.nm snm FROM user A INNER JOIN van B ON B.class_id = A.class_id INNER JOIN school C ON C.school_id = B.school_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND role = "ROLE_STD"
